data.message:
Application tabs going awaySoon, Facebook will no longer support tabs for applications. Find your favorite applications in the left hand navigation on your Facebook homepage. 
-facebook
now after reading this ^ i cant understand why facebook is being so retarded and taking everything that makes it awesome away: their chat IM is So broken the servers for the biggest games are deplorable- aka horrible and they wont fix it just keep making crap we dont want this site been up for about half of decade and we dont have a dislike button im seriously gettin frustrated and im feelin like deactivating this and stickin to the basics ...... my cell phone ftw
